nvfortran -O2 -Mfree -Mpreprocess -Mbackslash -traceback -acc -fast -Mnoautoinline -cuda -gpu=cc86,deepcopy -Minfo -fPIC -Wall -Kieee CMakeFiles/main.dir/main.f90.o -o main  -Wl,-rpath,/home/zhanp/gpulab/GPU_lab/queue_device/build CMakeFiles/event_module.dir/EventQueueItem.f90.o CMakeFiles/sort_module.dir/sort_module.f90.o CMakeFiles/event_queue.dir/event_queue.f90.o libthrust_sort.so
